BUTTON.SCRIPT: if AmIGuildMaster() then CallInputBox(GetTT(400564), 2, true, 10); end
if AmIGuildOwner() then CallInputBox(GetTT(400563), 1, true, 10); return true end
local kSelf = UISelf CallYesNoMsgBox(GetTT(400806), kSelf:GetOwnerGuid(), 5, kSelf:GetCustomDataAsInt())

FORM.SCRIPT: local self = UISelf if self:GetParent():IsVisible() then local eText = self:GetParent():GetControl("MEDT_CONTENTS"):GetEditText() self:SetStaticText( "{C=0xFF9e0b0f/}".. eText:Length() .. "{C=0xFF4D3413/}/100") end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf local kParent = kSelf:GetParent() local kEditWnd = kParent:GetControl("MEDT_CONTENTS") SetGuildNotice( kEditWnd:GetEditText() ) CloseUI("SFRM_GUILD_SET_NOTICE")
BUTTON.HOTKEY: local kSelf = UISelf local kParent = kSelf:GetParent() local kEditWnd = kParent:GetControl("MEDT_CONTENTS") SetGuildNotice( kEditWnd:GetEditText() ) CloseUI("SFRM_GUILD_SET_NOTICE") return true

ICON.SCRIPT: local self = UISelf self:CallIconToolTip() local b = true local cur = self:GetParent():GetControl("IMG_CURSOR") if false == cur:IsNil() then cur:Visible(b) if b then local pos = self:GetLocation() pos:SetX(pos:GetX()-1) pos:SetY(pos:GetY()-1) cur:SetLocation(pos) end end

local self = UISelf self:CallIconToolTip() local b = true local cur = self:GetParent():GetControl("IMG_CURSOR") if false == cur:IsNil() then cur:Visible(b) if b then local pos = self:GetLocation() pos:SetX(pos:GetX()-1) pos:SetY(pos:GetY()-1) cur:SetLocation(pos) end end

local self = UISelf self:CallIconToolTip() local b = true local cur = self:GetParent():GetControl("IMG_CURSOR") if false == cur:IsNil() then cur:Visible(b) if b then local pos = self:GetLocation() pos:SetX(pos:GetX()-1) pos:SetY(pos:GetY()-1) cur:SetLocation(pos) end end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf local kTopWnd = kSelf:GetParent() local kSelectedWnd = kTopWnd:GetControl("IMG_OVER1") if not kSelectedWnd:IsNil() then kSelectedWnd:SetLocation( kSelf:GetLocation() ) kSelectedWnd:Visible(true) kSelectedWnd:SetCustomDataAsInt( kSelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() ) end

STATIC_FORM.SCRIPT: CloseToolTip() local kSelf = UISelf local kSelectedWnd = kSelf:GetControl("IMG_OVER1") kSelectedWnd:SetCustomDataAsInt(-1) kSelectedWnd:Visible(false)

BUTTON.HOTKEY: local self = UISelf self:OnOk() self:CloseParent() return true
